name: GraFi St.Patrick
description:
GraFi St.Patrick - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, clovers, rainbows and changing gravity.
Player goal is to relocate green coin, using only the change of gravity, on the green rock and keep for some time to pass the level.

In GraFi St.Patrick:

- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Cool Soundtrack
- Achievements
- St.Patrick Day art
- Treadmills
- Portal's
- Clovers
- Rainbows
- 50 levels
